entry.title: Calathea White Star
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en Ligne
Type: Plant
Price: 22.99

Perhaps one of the most elegant yet relatively muted designs on a Calathea is that of the Calathea majestica ‘White star’ (goeppertia majestica). Its contrasting white and green foliage with violet undersides and subtle pink blush make a style statement.

  • Shape and size may vary from photo
  • Shipped in a 4" pot to prevent damage to the roots
  • Free delivery across Canada with a minimum purchase of $95
  • This plant is not shipped during cold season
 Medium to bright indirect light
 Keep moist but well drained. Water every 1-2 weeks.
 Rarely
 Non-toxic
 Growth : Up to 60 cm
 Origin : Brazil, South and Central America

entry.title: Begonia Venosa 2.5"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en Ligne
Type: Plant
Price: 13.99

Begonia Venosa, is a semi-succulent, upright type begonia native to Brazil. It has thick, round, leathery leaves that are covered with fine white hair. This stunning plant is meant to be kept as an indoor plant because of its gorgeous foliage and adorable flowers. 

  • Shape and size may vary from the photo
  • Shipped in a 2.5" pot to prevent damage to the roots
  • Free delivery across Canada with a minimum purchase of $95
  • Ships from April to Octobre

 Bright, indirect sunlight
 Water when soil is completely dry
 Fragrant white flowers
 Can be toxic to animals
 Growth : Up to 60cm
 Origin : Brazil

entry.title: Sansevieria Whale Fin 4"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en ligne
Type: Plant
Price: 25.99

Whale Fin Sansevieria succulents are quite unique-looking and make great statement pieces for indoor gardening. As the name suggests, the plant is shaped curiously like a whale fin, stiff, erect and large. The Whale Fin is highly prized by plant enthusiasts for its unique shape and variegated foliage. 

Sansevieria can tolerate extremely dry temperatures and a variety from lighting conditions from quite bright to very low light. They are slow growing and sculptural, making perfect office plants. 

  • Shape and size may vary from the photo
  • Shipped in a 4" pot to prevent damage to the roots
  • Free delivery across Canada with a minimum purchase of $95
 Low light to bright indirect light
 Water when soil is completely dry
 Rarely
 Toxic to animals
 Growth: Upright, over 30 cm
 Origin : Tropical Africa

entry.title: Chlorophytum comosum Bonnie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en Ligne
Type: Plant
Price: 9.99

Also known as Curly Spider Plant, Bonnie is one of the most popular air-purifying indoor house plants. It has classic green and white stripe variegation with uniquely attractive leaves that curl and swirl. Blooming stalks are yellow and often produce sprays of small white blooms. According to a NASA clean air study, Curly Spider Plant can filter formaldehyde, xylene, and toluene from the air.

  • Shape and size may vary from the photo
  • Shipped in a 4" pot to prevent damage to the roots
  • Free delivery across Canada with a minimum purchase of $95
 Low light to bright indirect light
 Allow top of soil to dry before watering
 Small white
 Non toxic
 Growth: Up to 60cm
 Origin : Tropical Africa
 Grown in Canada

entry.title: Ficus Elastica Tineke
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en Ligne
Type: Plant
Price: 14.99

Ficus Elastica Tineke is a variegated rubber tree variety having dark and light green patchy leaves with creamy edges and pink stems.  Its care is similar to that of the Rubber Tree, however its unique tri-colored variegation requires brighter light conditions than the Burgundy variety to keep the colors strong and defined.

This plant is very easy going and can handle many different conditions. It appreciates higher humidity, but be careful not to overwater!
  • Shape and size may vary from the photo
  • Shipped in a 4" pot to prevent damage to the roots
  • Will ship from April to October
  • Free delivery across Canada with a minimum purchase of $95
 Low light to bright indirect light
 Water thoroughly when 1-2 inches of soil are dry
 Rarely
 Mildly toxic to animals
 Growth: Tree-like, 2m indoors
 Origin : India, Malaysia
 Grown in Canada

entry.summary:
Vendor: Cactus en Ligne

This Sansevieria has tall grayish-green leaves in striped patterns. It is known for its air-purifying ability and is highly recommended for bedrooms, living rooms, offices, and hospital rooms. In Feng Shui, Sansevierias are considered plants that bring good luck.

This Sansevieria requires so little care that it makes it a perfect plant for indoor gardening beginners.
